name: Columbia World of Sports 1810: West Point Track and Field Events

Also known as: Columbia World of Sports (1948-1949 Season) #10: West Point Track and Field Events
Filming locations: United States Military Academy, West Point, New York, USA

description: Sportscaster Bill Stern drives north to the U. S. Military Academy (Army) at Westpoint, New York, to take a look at a regional NCAA Outdoor Track and Field meet, featuring athletes from the northeastern segment of the country. He ...
